name: @continuit/testreport
description: A fast, zero dependencies, SAX based XML parser for Deno, Node.js, Bun and browsers.
author: ContinuIT BV, The Netherlands

tasks.test: deno task test_prepare && deno test -RSW --coverage --clean --junit-path test_results/junit.xml && deno coverage --lcov --output=test_results/cov.lcov && deno coverage && deno run -RW ./src/mod.ts ./test_results/testReport.json
tasks.test_prepare: mkdir -p test_output && mkdir -p test_output/deno_success && mkdir -p test_output/deno_disabled && mkdir -p test_output/deno_failed && mkdir -p test_output/jest && mkdir -p test_output/vitest && mkdir -p test_output/no_tests
tasks.create_config_schema: deno eval 'import { zodToJsonSchema } from "npm:zod-to-json-schema"; import { testReportConfigSchema } from "./src/testReportConfig.ts"; Deno.writeTextFileSync("./configSchema/testReportConfigSchema.json", JSON.stringify(zodToJsonSchema(testReportConfigSchema), null, 2));'
